|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "70-A01526-03N" and some other stuff is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The GbE PHY used is presumed to be an AR8035-A. ===Probably used PSU(s)=== The FCC docs show the device w/ two different PSUs -
a '''DVE''' DSA-20CA-12 120150 and a '''PHIHONG''' PSA18R-120P. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = DVE |model = DSA-20CA-12 120150 |input_v=120-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China |output_conn=barrel |e_level=3 }} {{hasPowerSupply |brand = PHIHONG |model = PSA18R-120P |input_v=120-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
